thread.title: Systweak Softwares Official Website Gets A Facelift
thread.title_full: Systweak Softwares Official Website Gets A Facelift

title: Systweak Softwares Official Website Gets A Facelift
text:
Technology | 8 September 2015 14:18 CET Systweak Software’s Official Website Gets A Facelift By Soumya Singh 
Jaipur, India: Systweak Software, a leading company in software development space, recently launched its newly redesigned website. The new interface is entirely different from the older one and is visually appealing, thanks to the modern design elements that have been consistently used. 
After the huge makeover, the website looks more contemporary and intuitive. The slideshow on the home page hints at the applications and software developed by the company for various platforms such as iOS, Mac, Windows, and Android. 
The navigation between tabs is easier, so is finding any product developed by the company as they are listed on the basis of the OS platform they support. The Support page presents exhaustive set of FAQ’s for each product that the company offers to its users. 
Shrishail Rana, CEO of Systweak Software, says, “As the company is growing leaps and bounds, it is increasingly important to keep potential and existing users informed in the right way and thus, there was a need of a more interactive interface”. “Users interact better,” he adds, “when the experience is visually enriching and the content is to-the-point and informative. Keeping these pointers in mind we have overhauled the design of our website”. 
The new facelift will resonate well with the users as it is tuned to give maximum value to them per click. 
Visit Website at: http:// www.systweak.com
